branchCategory.name: VQC5000 Manifold/Valve Assembly with D-sub
branchCategory.description: <P>The VQC series has six standard wiring packages bringing a world of ease to wiring and maintenance work, while the protective enclosures of&nbsp;four of them conform to IP67 standards for protection from dust and moisture. The use of multi-pin connectors to replace wiring inside manifold blocks provides flexibility when adding stations or changing manifold configuration. The VQC series has outstanding response times and long life. </P>
